parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Indicates the related entities to be represented inline. The maximum depth is 2.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Restricts the set of items returned. The maximum number of expressions is 100. The allowed functions are: allfunctions.

parameters.description: Limits the number of items returned from a collection.

parameters.description: Excludes the specified number of items of the queried collection from the result.

parameters.description: Indicates whether the total count of items within a collection are returned in the result.

SingleResult.description: Represents an IQueryable containing zero or one entities. Use together with an [EnableQuery] from the System.Web.Http.OData or System.Web.OData namespace.

Queryable.description: The IQueryable containing zero or one entities.

ODataActionParameters.description:
ActionPayload holds the Parameter names and values provided by a client in a POST request
to invoke a particular Action. The Parameter values are stored in the dictionary keyed using the Parameter name.

scopes.cc_api: Toegang tot de ConnectivityCenter API. Hier kunnen alle basisgegevens (werkgevers, medewerkers, enz.) opgehaald worden. Belangrijkste publiek: Drupal AVportaal en PortalAdmin.
